mapper.select: select distinct tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_id,tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_name,tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_station_name,tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_order, tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_start_end,tb_routeOrder.city_name,tb_state.state_name from tb_routeOrder,tb_state where city_name=#{location} and tb_state.state_name='启用'

select tb_station.station_id,tb_station.city_name,tb_station.station_name,tb_station.station_lon,tb_station.station_lat,tb_state.state_name from tb_station,tb_state where tb_station.station_name like '%${stationName}%' and tb_state.state_id=tb_station.state_id

select t1.*,t2.routeOrder_station_name from tb_routeOrder t2, (select tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_name from tb_routeOrder where tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_station_name=#{stationName} )t1 where t1.routeOrder_name=t2.routeOrder_name and t2.routeOrder_start_end=0

select tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_id,tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_name,tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_station_name, tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_order,tb_routeOrder.city_name,tb_station.station_lon,tb_station.station_lat from tb_routeOrder,tb_station,tb_state where tb_station.station_name=tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_station_name and tb_state.state_id=tb_routeOrder.state_id and tb_routeOrder.routeOrder_name=#{route} and tb_state.state_name='启用'
select distinct tb_station.station_lon,tb_station.station_lat from tb_station where tb_station.station_name=#{stationName}
